body:
Discuss opinions about nba game 7 down below

as a fellow Ohio person I love the Cavs and I was super excited to see them win. I even heard fireworks from  the neighborhood over lol. Stuff curry can't shoot 3s tbh

title: Cleveland Cavs WON WOOO!!!

replies.body:
"The 73-9 record does not count if you don't win the the finals!!111!1!" -everybody

Im around cleveland and like gsw more than the cavs...
reason?
cause leflop thinking he's the best there has ever been.

btw nba is rigged, you think its a coincidence that right when gsw locked them down at 3-1, they suspend draymond which is a key factor to the warriors winning.
Or that they surprisingly went to a game 7...




nba loves money
